title: The Edge is Becoming More Critical in a World of 5G and IoT
description: The edge is becoming more critical in a world of 5G and IoT. I've seen the evolution from 1x to 3G to 4G and now 5G over the many years I've worked in the mobile space, and 5G and IoT will drive the biggest changes we have seen on the edge in 10 or 20 years.
author: Jonathan Morgan
